Paragraph.Text: The link between the Mynocks and the Hiveminds has been deciphered, and it seems we can reproduce the telepathic signals, meaning that we should be able to make a specific Hivemind grow, in order to farm the useful Resin.

The growth rate can be modulated by feeding the Agitator more or less power. Approximately 25 power is needed to cause a single growth on the Hivemind. There is no particular limit on how many Agitators can be used on any number of Hiveminds. Consider this a warning.
The centre of the Hive will need to be within 32 metres of the Agitator.
